Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurs in the entire event log
Percentage of process variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation being directly preceded by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurrences that are followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation activities occurring after at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation among all “awaiting”-type activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation appearing in variants that ultimately lead to SW-EIC Accept versus those leading to rejection or revision
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-Reviewer Agreed that subsequently reach SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurrences that are not followed by any further reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-AE Assign Reviewers, indicating how often assignment leads to awaiting recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants with performance duration above the median case duration
Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation that occurs only once per case, reflecting standard process flow versus rework
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation events per month to identify temporal patterns in AE recommendation delays
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
